message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $110. This is a limited-time offer, so don't hesitate to take advantage of it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $110 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider $90?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept $95 for the product. This is the best offer I can make at this time.
